Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted multiple commands to activate the arcgis environment, including sourcing different conda paths, but all resulted in "No such file or directory" errors. The latest attempt involved sourcing the con and executing. I tried multiple other commands with different conda paths, but all resulted in the same error. My latest action was to execute a command using the conda path "/opt/conda/etc/profile.d/conda.sh" to activate the arcgis environment and check the version. However, the command returned an error message indicating that the conda path does not exist.
"""
